text: The 2007–08 New Jersey Devils season is the team's 25th season in the National Hockey League since the franchise relocated to New Jersey. == Regular season == ==Playoffs== The Devils lost to the New York Rangers in the Conference Quarter-Finals 1 game to 4. ==References== Category:2007 in ice hockey Category:2008 in ice hockey Category:National Hockey League team seasons Category:2007 in New Jersey Category:2008 in the United States
title: 2007–08 New Jersey Devils season
